data.client_settings: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/68.0.3440.75 Safari/537.36
data.actual_result: The "Apply Now" button starts off showing "Login" and then quickly flips to Apply Now
data.expected_result: Since you are already Logged In, the "Apply Now" button should instantly show "Apply Now" rather than "Login"
data.short_description: [Website Bug] The HypeSquad Homepage "Apply Now" button quickly flips from "Login" to "Apply Now" when you're logged in
data.steps_to_repro: - Login on the main Discord website - go to the HypeSquad homepage
